tweet.text: Sec. James Baker’s visits to Potsdam (1989) and East Berlin (1990) made him the first and only U.S. Secretary of State to visit the German Democratic Republic on official travel: https://t.co/EWS1CQNCVt #ArchivesPostcard (1/2) https://t.co/PJwY5opKmx
tweet.html: Sec. James Baker’s visits to Potsdam (1989) and East Berlin (1990) made him the first and only U.S. Secretary of State to visit the German Democratic Republic on official travel: ow.ly/POvp50KbTaC #ArchivesPostcard (1/2)
